You must be at least 18 years old or have parental consent to use this site.

sections.heading: 6. Returns and Refunds

Return Policy: If you are not satisfied with your purchase, we accept returns for unused and unopened products within 1 day from the date of delivery. Please contact our customer service team to initiate the return process.

Refunds: Refunds will be processed once we receive and inspect the returned product. Please note that original shipping fees are non-refundable.

Exceptions: Some items may be non-returnable due to hygiene reasons (such as opened haircare products) or other conditions as outlined in our return policy.
